name: By my side
description:
Instruction:

WASD/direction arrows：move

mouse click：shoot

Hold Q：call Pal

Description:

You are Buddy, a unique bubble with a special ability to absorb and release particles. By absorbing dark particles, you can transfer them into white bullets, but you can't hold them for too long - they are heavier than a bubble. 

The little fish is Pal, the only companion in your lonely journey. She is caring and cute but not so clever. She always wants to be helpful, take good care of her.

The water area is not quite safe, you need to leave here as soon as possible. Be careful not to be devoured by the darkness, both of you.

Good luck.
